plot: In 2001 we documented the unique love story of Linus Larrabee and Cori Caniggia, UCLA students and neighbors. Ten years later, we come back to find out what happened to them...
title: Linus & Cori
plot_es: In 2001 we documented the unique love story of Linus Larrabee and Cori Caniggia, UCLA students and neighbors. Ten years later, we come back to find out what happened to them...
